channel.title: Need A Little Bit Of Help
channel.description: Alright I rebooted my computer. And when I click runserver it says started platinumscape PK on 0.0.0.0:5555 and then I open up moparscape and I click new IP or w/e and put in my computer IP and then the port to 5555 and I get nothing... but when I put in 0.0.0.0 for the IP and 5555 as port it works. but no-one can connect to the server. It might be my java Im not sure. Im willing to have someone add my msn and I give them remote assistance. and They can fix it for me. If I see you are doing anything Im unsure Ill close it that moment. my msn is jay.popgun@hotmail.com

item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

or just add whatever port your server is to the firewall exceptions

sometimes u have to turn ur firewall off for people to get on as firewall restrics some of the stuff mopar has 2 use.
